errorSummary:
Exception while processing Invoke request for endpoint <GetItemFromATP_REQUEST>. Error Message : Pure SQL Exception.
Pure SQL Execute of SELECT     mpna,     test_site,     test_osp_item,     msp_osp_item,     test_osp_price,     msp_osp_price FROM     xxpsg_test_bpa_upd_v WHERE         mpna = ?     AND test_site = ? failed.
Caused by java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: ORA-00942: table or view does not exist

https://docs.oracle.com/error-help/db/ora-00942/.
Check to ensure that the database object(table,view) exists and all parameters and their data types are properly defined.Please examine the error message carefully to determine a resolution.  This exception is considered retriable, likely due to a communication failure.
